title: ssh: poisons the go.crypto library for use in app engine
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Include anything from code.google.com/p/go.crypto in an app engine project
2.
3.

What is the expected output?
The package (specifically go.crypto/scrypt in my case) works

What do you see instead?
Compile fails due to "syscall" import in ssh/terminal, even if ssh is not
needed by the project

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g for GAE

Which operating system are you using?
GAE

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go_appengine_sdk_linux_amd64-1.7.1.zip

Please provide any additional information below.
The ssh package seems to cause multiple errors in app engine, not just the one I cited. 
I tried deleting my way out of the problem, but that makes tracking the upstream package
awkward.
